Name: Inori's House
About the game: School’s done for the day, but everyone seems to have plans to visit the creepy house at the edge of town. Will you join them? Welcome to Inori’s House , a visual novel containing various branching paths. Choose to side with your friends, or give a loving stranger a chance. How will your story end? This game contains sexual content and violence. It is not suitable for children.
